sn32.53:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn32.53:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekada sitam hoti”ti?
sn32.53:1.6: ‘yannuna mayam sakaya ratiya vaseyyama’ti, tesam tam cetopanidhimanvaya sitam hoti.
sn32.53:1.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yenekada sitam hoti”ti.
